ISSUE.TITLE: Organization as a column in the Templates view?
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Feature Idea ##### SUMMARY Is it possible to add organization as a column in the Templates view in AWX? Currently, we need to prefix all template names to easily separate ownership.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #12287 from fosterseth/fix_children_summary_not_tree detect if job events are tree-like and collapsible

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Add column org to template list Add column org to template list See: https://github.com/ansible/awx/issues/11795
